game.name: OVERTYPE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Overtype is a roguelike typing action game set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse. Type to fight, dodge, and survive against waves of cyborgs and corrupted machines. Every keystroke is your weapon master speed and precision to uncover Zyra’s legacy and type out humanity’s last hope.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Overtype is a roguelike typing action game set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse. Type to fight, dodge, and survive against waves of cyborgs and corrupted machines. Every keystroke is your weapon master speed and precision to uncover Zyra’s legacy and type out humanity’s last hope.
